data.name: col-xxs-[1-12]
data.description: CSS class prefix for extra extra small screens (479px and below)

data.name: col-xs-[1-12]
data.description: CSS class prefix for extra small screens (480px to 639px)

data.name: col-sm-[1-12]
data.description: CSS class prefix for small screens (640px to 767px)

data.name: col-md-[1-12]
data.description: CSS class prefix for medium screens (768px to 991px)

data.name: col-lg-[1-12]
data.description: CSS class prefix for large screens (992px to 1199px)

data.name: col-xl-[1-12]
data.description: CSS class prefix for extra large screens (1200px to 1399px)

data.name: col-xxl-[1-12]
data.description: CSS class prefix for extra extra large screens (1400px and above)

data.name: u-shadow-none
data.description: Clears any shadow applied to an element

data.name: u-shadow-sm
data.description: Small shadow applied to an element

data.name: u-shadow-md
data.description: Medium shadow applied to an element

data.name: u-shadow-lg
data.description: Large shadow applied to an element

data.name: u-pullLeft
data.description: Float to left

data.name: u-pullRight
data.description: Float to right

data.name: u-alignTop
data.description: Vertically align to the top

data.name: u-alignMiddle
data.description: Vertically align to the middle

data.name: u-alignBaseline
data.description: Vertically align to the text baseline

data.name: u-alignBottom
data.description: Vertically align to the bottom

data.name: u-flex
data.description: Treat the element as a flex container and its children as flex items

data.name: u-flex-item
data.description: Size item according to its width and height properties, but grow to absorb any extra free space in the flex container and shrink to its minimum size to fit the container

data.name: u-flex-direction-column
data.description: Direction in which lines of text are stacked. Aligns items in columns as opposed to rows

data.name: u-flex-wrap
data.description: Break flex items into multiple lines

data.name: u-flex-wrap-nowrap
data.description: Lay flex items out in a single line which may cause the flex container to overflow

data.name: u-flex-basis-auto
data.description: Set the size of the element relative to the width and height of the content of the element

data.name: u-flex-basis-100
data.description: Set the size of the element(s) to 100% of the available space in the parent container

data.name: u-flex-basis-0
data.description: Prevent the element(s) from taking up the available space in the parent container

data.name: u-flex-grow-1
data.description: Allow the item to grow to fit available space

data.name: u-flex-grow-0
data.description: Do not allow the item to grow to fit available space

data.name: u-flex-shrink-1
data.description: Allow the item to shrink to fit available space

data.name: u-flex-shrink-0
data.description: Prevent the item from shrinking to fit available space

data.name: u-order-0
data.description: Set the order to lay out an item in a flex container (order 0)

data.name: u-order-1
data.description: Set the order to lay out an item in a flex container (order 1)

data.name: u-order-2
data.description: Set the order to lay out an item in a flex container (order 2)

data.name: u-order-3
data.description: Set the order to lay out an item in a flex container (order 3)

data.name: u-order-4
data.description: Set the order to lay out an item in a flex container (order 4)

data.name: u-order-5
data.description: Set the order to lay out an item in a flex container (order 5)

data.name: u-order-xxs-[0-5]
data.description: Flex order for screen widths 479px and below

data.name: u-order-xs-[0-5]
data.description: Flex order for screen widths 480px to 639px

data.name: u-order-sm-[0-5]
data.description: Flex order for screen widths 640px to 767px

data.name: u-order-md-[0-5]
data.description: Flex order for screen widths 768px to 991px

data.name: u-order-lg-[0-5]
data.description: Flex order for screen widths 992px to 1199px

data.name: u-order-xl-[0-5]
data.description: Flex order for screen widths 1200px to 1399px

data.name: u-order-xxl-[0-5]
data.description: Flex order for screen widths 1400px and above

data.name: u-justify-content-flex-start
data.description: Horizontally align (justify) content to the start of the div

data.name: u-justify-content-flex-end
data.description: Horizontally align (justify) content to the end of the div

data.name: u-justify-content-center
data.description: Horizontally align (justify) content to the center of the div

data.name: u-justify-content-space-between
data.description: Distribute content evenly with the first item flush with the start and the last item flush with the end

data.name: u-justify-content-space-around
data.description: Distribute content evenly with a half-size space on either end of items

data.name: u-justify-content-stretch
data.description: Distribute content evenly by stretching 'auto'-sized items to fit the container

data.name: u-align-items-flex-start
data.description: Vertical alignment. The cross-start margin edges of the flex items are flushed with the cross-start edge of the line

data.name: u-align-items-flex-end
data.description: Vertical alignment. The cross-end margin edges of the flex items are flushed with the cross-end edge of the line

data.name: u-align-items-start
data.description: Vertical alignment. Pack items flush to each other toward the start edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis

data.name: u-align-items-center
data.description: Vertically align all items to the center of the div

data.name: u-align-items-end
data.description: Vertical alignment. Pack items flush to each other toward the end edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis

data.name: u-align-self-flex-start
data.description: Vertical alignment of individual flex item. Flush the cross-start margin edges of the flex item with the cross-start edge of the line

data.name: u-align-self-flex-end
data.description: Vertical alignment of individual flex item. Flush the cross-end margin edges of the flex item with the cross-end edge of the line

data.name: u-align-self-start
data.description: Vertical alignment of individual flex item. Pack the item flush to the edge of the alignment container of the start side of the item, in the appropriate axis

data.name: u-align-self-center
data.description: Vertically align individual flex item to the center of the div

data.name: u-align-self-end
data.description: Vertical alignment of individual flex item. Pack the item flush to the edge of the alignment container of the end side of the item, in the appropriate axis

data.name: u-align-self-stretch
data.description: Vertical alignment of individual flex item. Stretch flex item such that the cross-size of the item margin box is the same as the line while respecting widget and height constraints

data.name: margin-none
data.description: No margin

data.name: margin-sm
data.description: 8 px margin | Specify direction like this: margin-left-sm

data.name: margin-md
data.description: 16 px margin | Specify direction like this: margin-left-md

data.name: margin-lg
data.description: 32 px margin | Specify direction like this: margin-left-lg

data.name: margin-auto
data.description: Aligns content into the center

data.name: padding-none
data.description: No padding

data.name: padding-sm
data.description: 8 px padding | Specify direction like this: padding-left-sm

data.name: padding-md
data.description: 16 px padding | Specify direction like this: padding-left-md

data.name: padding-lg
data.description: 32 px padding | Specify direction like this: padding-left-lg

data.name: w[10-800]
data.description: Width to specified value in pixels. Sizes in 10px increments

data.name: w[5-100]p
data.description: Width to specified percentage. Percentages in 5% increments

data.name: mnw[10-800]
data.description: Min-width to specified value in pixels. Sizes in 10px increments

data.name: mxw[10-800]
data.description: Max-width to specified value in pixels. Sizes in 10px increments

data.name: h[10-800]
data.description: Height to specified value in pixels. Sizes in 10px increments

data.name: mxh[10-800]
data.description: Max-height to specified value in pixels. Sizes in 10px increments

data.name: u-textStart
data.description: Align text to the start of the container

data.name: u-textCenter
data.description: Align text to the center of the container

data.name: u-textEnd
data.description: Align text to the end of the container

data.name: u-textUpper
data.description: Sets the text to use all uppercase

data.name: u-textLower
data.description: Sets the text to use all lowercase

data.name: u-textInitCap
data.description: Sets the first letter in each word to use uppercase

data.description: Italicize text

data.name: u-underline
data.description: Underline text

data.name: u-hidden
data.description: Hide text

data.name: u-visible
data.description: Show text

data.name: u-nowrap
data.description: Text stays on one line and does not wrap

data.description: Limit text to 2 lines, adding ellipsis if it exceeds

data.name: u-lineclamp-5
data.description: Limit text to 5 lines, adding ellipsis if it exceeds

data.name: u-VisuallyHidden
data.description: Make text visually hidden, but still accessible for assistive technologies
